title: Understanding HTML Semantics for Better Web Accessibility
excerpt: Learn why semantic HTML is critical for accessibility, SEO, and maintainable frontend development.
content: Semantic HTML provides meaning to web content, making it easier for browsers, screen readers, and search engines to understand your application. In this article, we explore common semantic elements like header, nav, main, section, and article, and explain how using them correctly improves accessibility, SEO rankings, and long-term maintainability of web projects.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: CSS Layout Techniques Every Frontend Developer Should Know
excerpt: A practical guide to mastering Flexbox, Grid, and modern CSS layout patterns.
content: Modern CSS provides powerful layout systems such as Flexbox and Grid that simplify responsive design. This article explains when to use Flexbox versus Grid, common layout patterns, and real-world use cases that help frontend developers build clean and responsive interfaces efficiently.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: Why Tailwind CSS Is a Game-Changer for Modern UI Development
excerpt: Discover how utility-first CSS improves development speed, consistency, and scalability.
content: Tailwind CSS introduces a utility-first approach that eliminates the need for large custom CSS files. This post explains how Tailwind improves productivity, enforces design consistency, and fits perfectly into component-based frameworks like React.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: JavaScript Fundamentals That Power Modern Web Applications
excerpt: A deep dive into core JavaScript concepts every developer must master.
content: JavaScript is the backbone of modern web development. This article covers essential concepts like closures, hoisting, event delegation, async/await, and promises, explaining how they are used in real-world applications.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: Building Scalable React Applications
excerpt: Learn best practices and patterns for building scalable and maintainable React apps.
content: Scalable React applications rely on component reusability, proper state management, and clean architecture. This post explores folder structure, hooks, performance optimization, and best practices for long-term scalability.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: Understanding State Management in React
excerpt: Learn how state works in React and when to lift, localize, or centralize it.
content: State management is a critical part of React applications. This article explains local state, props drilling, context API, and when external libraries are necessary for managing complex application state.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: Getting Started with Node.js for Backend Development
excerpt: An introduction to Node.js and how it powers scalable backend systems.
content: Node.js allows developers to build fast and scalable backend applications using JavaScript. This article covers core concepts like the event loop, non-blocking I/O, and building basic APIs.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: Building REST APIs with Express.js
excerpt: Learn how Express.js simplifies backend API development in Node.js.
content: Express.js is a minimal and flexible Node.js framework. This post explains routing, middleware, request handling, and how to structure RESTful APIs efficiently.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: Introduction to MongoDB for MERN Stack Developers
excerpt: Understand how MongoDB fits into the MERN stack ecosystem.
content: MongoDB is a NoSQL database widely used in MERN applications. This article explains collections, documents, schema design, and how MongoDB integrates with Node and Express.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: JWT Authentication Explained for Beginners
excerpt: Learn how JSON Web Tokens work and why they are widely used for authentication.
content: JWT authentication enables secure communication between client and server. This post explains token structure, authentication flow, security best practices, and common mistakes developers should avoid.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: What It Takes to Become a MERN Stack Developer
excerpt: A roadmap and skill breakdown for aspiring MERN stack developers.
content: Becoming a MERN stack developer requires strong fundamentals in frontend, backend, and databases. This article outlines essential skills, tools, project ideas, and learning strategies to grow as a full-stack developer.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: Frontend vs Backend: Understanding the Full-Stack Workflow
excerpt: Understand how frontend and backend work together in modern web applications.
content: This article explains the responsibilities of frontend and backend systems, how APIs connect them, and why understanding both sides makes you a better developer.
author: Shivam Narayan

title: 1-Frontend vs Backend: Understanding the Full-Stack Workflow
excerpt: Understand how frontend and backend work together in modern web applications.
content: This article explains the responsibilities of frontend and backend systems, how APIs connect them, and why understanding both sides makes you a better developer.
